bibl.title: Columbia George v. Charles B. Hopkins. Motion and Affidavit
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuit Courts, Western District of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1899-1906, vol 2

div1.p: United States Circuit Court, District of Washington
In re Columbia George application for Writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed Mar 5 1906 A. Reeves Ayres, Clerk A. N. Moore, Deputy Clerk
United States Circuit Court for the Western District of Washington.
In the Matter of the application of Columbia George for a writ of Habeas Corpus

To the Clerk of the above Entitled Court:
You will please enter my appearance as attorney for petitioner in the above entitled cause
R.J. Slater Pendleton Oregon
Notice. - Attorneys will please endorse their own Filings. Rule 47
